name: Dice path
description:
Game made by one person (myself).

It's a puzzle game were you need to roll the dice to reduce numbers of the numbers on the fields in limited number of moves.

Controls:
Arrows / WSAD to move.

EDIT: The game has been done completely by myself - no additional has been used (i did an upsie whyle filling the GMTK GJ entry form)

Game available by .7z file - build for Windows.

HIT1! Remember that sum of both sides of dice should be 7.
HIT2! Remember that stepping on field REDUCES number of 'point' needed on the field.
HIT3! If you are having problem with LEVEL2 here is solution:
SSSADDASSSSSWW
